Hello world,

Below is a link to a few of the websites that have qualities we want to integrate into our own.

https://www.yourhomesuite.com/
www.airbnb.com
https://www.corporatehousingbyowner.com/
https://www.housestay.com/
https://www.trulia.com/rent/
https://www.zillow.com/
https://www.vacasa.com/

We want our website to have the following capabilities and qualities:

1.	This is a website for a Real Estate company based out of Santa Monica CA doing business all throughout los angeles so a design that is inviting and catches the attention of people looking to rent, long or short term and buy real estate.
2.	Data Integration; One of the pages and functions of the site is to populate all listing from “The MLS”; the mls is a database exclusive for realtors to list all of their properties and put them on the market; this is the same data base that websites like Zillow.com and trulia.com get most of their data. (real estate for sale, real estate for lease off market information of properties according to public records)
3.	Listing search : we want to divide our data into 3 categories: 
a.	Corporate housing / short term furnished units
b.	Apartments for lease
c.	Homes for sale
4.	Pages need to properly detail the information for each property or listing; beds baths, amenities, services, address, etc
5.	The website should be able to connect to social media accounts
6.	The website need to have a database of leads coming in; people that enter the site, view listings, and express and interest. Such database should be geared towards lead management
7.	Website should have the capability also for landlords or home owners to create an account on the website and upload their own listings; such listings should populate in the maps in additional to data extracted from the mls
8.	Website should be design in a way that it rank up higher on search engines such as google, yahoo, and bing
9.	We are looking for a long term relationship with a company that can help us grow and run an efficient operation.

Please reach out to discuss further the timeline that it would take to create a website like this and the cost.

Best,

Jay

Hi!

We are a small e-commerce store, selling products online over eBay and Amazon. We have a large product catalogue and serve about 5000 customers daily. We want a web based back office system to be developed.  In summary, the system should be able to handle all the following things,
	Keep Inventory record.
	Keep Customer record.
	Manage transactions and sale records.
	A very specific order sorting process, that helps in printing different types of items on different kind of packing envelops.
	Manage picking and packing records by the workers (Also maintain timesheet).
The system is supposed to web based and should be able to able 20-30 simultaneous users located at different locations.
Please quote the project pricing and let me know if you need anything for me in support of the project. I can provide all the necessary documents and be the basic point of communication from the business side and me.

Hello,

We are going to launch a Nepali national news website in Nepali language.

We have the following:
1.     Domain name and space

2.     Basic layout of all pages (landing page, news detail page, and section news page)

3.     Basic logo and branding

 
We need the following:
1.     Page header and footer design

2.     Menu bar design

3.     Brand based evaluation and redesign of existing page layouts (assuming we need redesign)

4.     Logo and branding redesign if needed based on header design

5.     Mobile and tablet responsive

6.     Search engine friendly design

7.     Link to social network sites

8.     Text zoom feature in news detail pages only.

9.     Night mode feature

10.  Option to add additional pages in future

 
Questions:

1. Based on these information, can you give rough estimation on price?

2. Let me know if you can add night mode and text zoom features.

3. Please give time estimation to deploy the website.

Hope to hear from you either way. 

Thank you,

Mun Adhikari

We are a Japanese Tech company and would like to build Global Corporate website and also landing pages.

Requirements: Global corporate website design. Landing Page Development. Application UI redesign..
For the global website approximately 15-20 pages.
- Responsive
- Flat design and the pages should load fast
- The content should be updatable. i.e. We should be be able to change the content of the website without any development.

Landing page requirement -
Since landing pages and the contents are specific to the features of our product, the number of pages in Landing Page might differ. But on an average 2-3 LP in a month.

Application UI -
I think redesign of application UI is bit complicated and it will not just be like simple UI redesign, UI and the feature of the product are dependent on each other, proabably I might need to  explain the Application UI (both web and mobile version) details later on. I might need to show you the UI of the application and you will be able to understand issues.

We don't need the domain name and server space, as the website will be hosted in our server.

Dear Team,
We have following two requirements from our reputed clients
1.	Development of new static web site for their IT division. The client would like to show case various products and service they offer and also various agencies their represents. 

The website will have approximately 15 web pages, but since the client have not decided on the content ; we need to suggest appropriate contents after referring www.bahwanit.com website as recommended by them. The site will include a page for user registration and based on the user email id collected , system will send the news letters as and when required. 
Since the division is a new set-up, they would also like to have the designing of their company logo.


Please send us the best quote for development and hosting of the website along with 3 sample designs/templates or 3 reference web-sites at the earliest.

2.	Development of Corporate website for a big conglomerate with 75 plus group companies . The website will have approximately 100 web-pages that will display listing of all the group companies , agencies the group represents, about us, their vision and mission, NEWS, Careers, contact us. One page will be dedicated for each company. 


Please send us the best quote for development this website along with 3 sample designs/templates or 3 reference web-sites at the earliest.

Both the above website should have the following features
1.	User should be able to modify the content using content management
2.	Should be responsive website
3.	Should be SEO friendly.
Please send me your quote on vipul_mistry@yahoo.com . You can reach me on +968-92802178

Dear ladies and gentlemen,

 

Pls be so kind to check the following request to create a website.

 

Description/ purpose of the projct:

It is a site for a kind of children´s rights initiative that shall help to re-establish contact between children that have to live under the conditions of "parental alientation syndrome" ("PAS") and their depreviated parent in Germany.

 

Let´s call the project here "greatreunification"

 

There will be signs visible (e.g. mounted on bicycles or sent via email to certain receipients) just stating: greatreunification.com or something like that (we will share the precise name with you in next step). The signs will be just white with orange letters. They will mostly be mounted on orange decorated bicycles or people will get an email or a letter like that with no more info on them. This is called a "child-in-trouble-post".

 

The person who sees that website should become curious and visit the website. Thus no SEO is needed for the moment. The persons who see that notification should enter it into a browser or they can photo the QR-code containing the URL of the website to get to the website directly by their smart phones.

 

Thus the website needs to be responsive, mostly optimized to either 13 inch laptop or to regular iPhone-like screens.

 

Landing page: The landing page is a short questionaire in order to give him the precise information in the next step. Here he should be asked. Are you: 1) a child that can not have contact to at least one of his parents? 2) an adult who can not have contact with at least one of his children? 3) a teacher/ trainer or a governemental official? 4) an non affected adult who wants to offer help to children who can not have contact to at least one of his parents? or 5) other - none of 1)-4)?

 

After that choice the visitor should be taken to the start page of his peer group.

 

 

So we need five quite similar pages of the peer group containing e.g. for the children (peer group 1):

Header (home button, what is PAS? button, what is bad about PAS? button, what can I do against PAS?, who is "greatreunification"? button, eventually - depending on peer group -: child-in-trouble-post button, faq-button, contact button).

 

Below the header there needs to be a short information, why the person is most probably here. E.g. for peer group 1 "affected child":

"You are missing one of your parents and so does he. If you have read this notification you can be sure, that your missed parent does everything he can in order to get into contact with you but has come to a point where he is hindered to get through to you. You are not alone in this situation. Many other children have the same fate. You are not to blame for that, no matter what you have said or done so far. Your missed parent knows that and he does not blame you for anything that had happened, he is just loving and missing you and will always wait with open arms for you and promisses, that he will treat your contact secretly to any third party, if you wish. You are always free to establish contact with him, even secretly, if there are circumstances in your life or people around who are against that. The situation you are in might be something that is called "PAS", "parental alientation syndrome". Just go and look for that on internet. You will find plenty of information. You have the key to get out: any short notice to your missed parent smashes the ice. If you need help, because e.g. you do not know the adress or contact details of your missed parent. Don´t worry. There are many institutions willing to help you on that. Look e.g. on the website of https://vaeteraufbruch.de, they have experts who can help you totally confidentially or ask at school, whether there is a school psychologist who offers you help without telling to your other parent. Be strong! Your missed parent will never let you down."

 

This is just to show you, that there might be quite some content to show under the header for all peer groups.

 

 

FAQ part would be like usual.

 

The design of the website should be modern, bringing sympathy and containing the CI colour orange that we need for the child-in-trouble-posts. The content for the website will be German, we will be able to share with you all the necessary content.

 

On the sub-site "download child-in-trouble-post" the visitor can download a pdf that contains the standardized child-in-trouble-post to be printed out and sent by letter or forwarded by email.

 

The button with the request a child-in-trouble-post a child-in-trouble-post needs to be linked with a very simple database. On the particular sub-page if a request is posted, the visitor gets a short description what it is all about, see the already existing requests for child-in-trouble-posts and then he can enter an adress (that is just cross-checked against e.g. sql-injects) anonymously. So he can request a child-in-trouble-post located on a place in the public (e.g. in nearby a house that a child in trouble lives in, close to it´s school, it´s sports club or in front of a court, a youth welfare office...).

 

The visitor here can also anonymously upload a photo of a bicycle that had been put to one place where a child-in-trouble-post had been requested or just put a mark that the post had taken place and tell about the date where the installation has been put up. Everything sorted by request date.

 

All other sites will only contain content, one contact form whith check of real person and forwarding the message to an email account is also required.

 

The website will be handled anonymously in order to make it more difficult for third parties to hinder the activities, for this purpose we are checking the available services for anonymous hosting and would transfer the website there as soon as finished.

 

 

Glad to hear from you and best regards from Germany

 

 

Gabriel Straub

I am working on the launch of an agency providing full-service solutions for businesses of all types to help them with all areas of marketing and within that includes design and development. Right now, my funds are very tight until launch and I need help with CannabisMarketingGeeks.com. I had a developer that flaked on me and as you can see the best he did was the logo design. The theme is a divi theme which he didn't really use his heart to fulfill the design. Basically here is what I need, a developer/designer with strong abilities willing to help me help them with an increased reach. You see, this is a niche agency but this one is the strongest opportunity. As you know, it's the founding days of the Cannabis industry, and this agency has tons of potential to help us get to where we can not only get profits coming in to reward those dedicated to the cause, but to also continue furthering our reach into other industries as well. As far as what I need, please see as follows.

Brand Identity Stylesheet/Guidelines (Choosing a proper color scheme, typography, etc. to use on all aspects of our branding/marketing tasks for now and the future. Something we follow to keep it in sync and not everywhere, thus enhancing our branding impact on those we reach.)

Custom graphics and customization of a Divi Wordpress theme, maybe even a completely custom Divi child theme. Some of the ones I like in their approaches are:

http://webdesign-finder.com/html/canabia/index.html 
This one is pretty clean, while there are certain elements that seem too basic, it has a really clean flow. Just doesn't fully have the WOW effect we need to fully stand out, but something like this but turned up could be effective for the agency site.

http://medigreen.bold-themes.com/
The stylish text that says "MEDICAL MARIJUANA" makes one think on certain areas of CMG it could be a great effect, but with a more realistic texture that is clearly marijuana leaves or something relevant of that nature. So an approach to keep in mind for sure.

http://medigreen.bold-themes.com/consulting/
Pretty good design, and with a little more love to give it more WOW it could stand out among online presences by cannabis ad agencies. The shade of green is definitely more on point for our brand image we would want to embrace as it definitely beats that dark hunter green you see overused on the current CMG site.

http://medigreen.bold-themes.com/lounge/
While we would most likely want to use more green to be aligned with the brand identity we develop to uphold, the purple and overall style gives it a very fun feeling and approach. Something we definitely want to make sure to embrace on the CMG website in order to fit right into the cannabis scene in a unique yet non-boring manner others haven't embraced within the industry yet. The design is very good too so we should use this as one of the top sources of inspiration.

http://webdesign-finder.com/html/canabro/
While it does have some blocks and elements that will need enhanced to give it a true WOW factor, the style overall is very much on point. Especially the top with the faded filter on top of the slider image and mini marijuana leaves plus the texture and placement for the texture where you see email, phone, address, social, and search.

http://jointup.just-themes.com/
Another fun layout and smooth flow, am sure it serves to inspire something on what we are trying to do for CMG.

http://jointup.just-themes.com/homepage-coffeeshop/
Beats the previous, is fun, and has an eyecatching flow and placement of elements. Definitely in the real of what we are trying to do for our brand image, but it still needed enhancement to completely WOW those who wander upon it.

http://webdesign-finder.com/prestashop/canabia/
Pretty clean, maybe an overload on whitespace with opp for further enhancements.

https://cannaverde.progressionstudios.com/
Smooth flow, but also too traditional in the sense as certain images and elements are used by most websites today.

http://w4.themedemo.co/sativaka/
Very clean, smooth, and professional. Definitely on point and workable in most senses.

http://slidesigma.com/themes/html/weedly/shop-extended/index.html
Clean, professional, seamless. But still has a normal aspect to it with a lot of elements and add-ins being used by a majority of sites online today.

http://slidesigma.com/themes/html/weedly/index.html
Very professional, throw on a suit and tie. The Explore Populare Strain section usage of periodic table blocks and description of each via slider type style is definitely worthy of attention. We could use something like this on the CMG site I think as long as done properly and tastefully. The greens are good tool.

http://slidesigma.com/themes/html/weedly/recreational/index.html
Combined with certain styles and elements in previously mentioned professional appearance mainstream-like themes, it could add the fun aspect we need without a doubt. The pinks and purples are awesome but probably need to be used slightly less for our website particularly. The smoking images and designs are without a doubt a great way to build a bond with visitors since it lets the industry and its notions speak for itself without sacrificing professionalism. The usage of black is also great, and since black means power it suits the agency that stands out as the industry later which we hope is what our agency comes to do.

http://slidesigma.com/themes/html/weedly/weedo-main/index.html
Definitely a top source for inspiration thanks to its style, balance of various colors, etc. Worth paying close attention to and learning/getting ideas from.

http://templatemonsterpreview.com/demo/82872.html?ab=new
Slider approach is pretty interesting and tasteful.

https://liftedthemes.com/grape-ape/#
Tasteful in its own ways.

I'm a magician and I want to create an app with the lowest cost possible, does not have to look good just to do the work fine.
The details:
I want an app that randomly selects a playing card. By clicking on the back of the playing card it starts to show random cards and stops randomly at one.
But I need to add a feauture which allows the magician to program the app to chose the playing card he wants while the spectator thinks its random.
So, to do so, the magician will demonstrate how the app works to the spectator, while he is doing that he is programing the app. So the screen is devided into 5 parts as shown in the attachment 1. The magician will click on the back of the playing card to start to select random card and when the random card is shown he clicks again to reset it to the first position ( the back of the card ). Now, how the programing works: in the palying cards there are 13 values from Ace which is 1 to the King which is 13. So as shown in the attachment 1 there are 4 parts from 1 to 4, if the magician clicks on 1 and the random card starts to get generated the program knows to deliver the next set of numbers which are 1-2-3-4 as shwon in attachment 2. And then if he clicks on 1 it means the Ace if he clicks for example on 2 its the value 2 of something (diamond, spades, clubs or hearts). then he clicks the middle part to confirm as shown in attachment 5.
Back to the attachment 1. If he clicks on 2. The program knows to deliver the next set which are 5-6-7-8 as shown in the attachment 3. And if the magician clicks for example on 7 its the value 7 of one of the suits(spades, hearts, clubs or diamonds). then he clicks the middle part to confirm as shown in attachment 5.
Back to the attachment 1. If he clicks on 3. The same thing, the program knows to deliver the next set which are 9-10-11-12 as shown in the attachment 4. And the same, thing if the magician clicks for example on 10 its the value 10 of ( spades,hearts, diamonds or clubs). then he clicks the middle part to confirm as shown in attachment 5.
Back to attachment 1. Now if he clicks on 4, we have only one number vlaue left which is 13. So when he cliks on 4 he has directly to click on the middle button or part to confirm directly.

By doing so, he programs the app to chose the value. Now to chose the suit, after clicking the confrim button or part in the middle. the program knows to deliver the next set which are H-D-C-S for Hearts, Diamonds, Clubs and spades as shown in attachment 6. The magician clicks on the suit he wants, but this time he does not have to click on confirm.

All the sets of numbers and suits which the magician should click on to program the app are not visible. So it looks like he is clicking on the back of the card to start to generate random card and clicks again to reset it to the first position the back of the card. So while he is doing that he knows which area or part of the screen to click on, each one corresponds to each number of the set.

I am a volunteer in Kherson region in Ukraine and I must admit that the situation has become extremely dire. The Russian forces are intensifying their attacks almost on an hourly basis, which has resulted in a cut off of all essential supplies and clothing. With extreme cold and lack of food supplies, it has become extremely difficult for innocent Ukrainian civilians to survive, most of whom are homeless. Internet and all communications are heavily censored and down most of the time.

We have been promised foreign aid by countless charities and organisations but in reality, hardly anything arrives. I suspect that all deliveries are being intercepted by Russian troops.

As a last resort, I am appealing to foduu.com to help Ukrainian civilians in the region with all essential supplies.

We would ideally need medical supplies, food (non-perishable or longer lasting), warm clothing and anything else you may be able to provide.

If you are able to deliver help, please could you send it to the below address which we are using as shelter for the time being.

Kherson State Agrarian University
Stritenska St, 23
Kherson, Kherson Oblast 
Ukraine, 73006

Alternatively, we are also accepting cryptocurrency donations as conventional banking instruments are simply not available to us. If you do not have cryptocurrency, you can easily purchase and send it from Coinbase, Coinpayments, Coin Mama or alternative providers.

Below are the wallet addresses of our local humanitarian volunteer group:

Bitcoin: bc1q9uun7eny4t8pvlq7lmz39z9rr7rm3vw849hqwv

Ethereum: 0xa74cce7805342F10df39B698342380f58bB709b5

No donation is too small and will be most appreciated.

I would like to send you some pictures and video footage of the atrocities in the region but unfortunately, the internet is too slow and very intermittent.

I would be most appreciative if you could share this message on social media and your friends to raise awareness about the situation and lobby your local government to provide more support to Ukrainian army.

Thank you for you help.

Best wishes

Kathaleen Kesteven

Hello, I need a system to manage my private art institute where we provide courses with different levels, durations, prices...
I need to manage the full cycle including registration, enrolment, course scheduling, classroom availability, instructors, sales, CRM, accounting including payables and receivables
 
I am running a coaching/training academy for art courses and all my courses are instructor led and on site
I have around 40 courses and we run a group for each course based on the demand and we don’t have predefined schedule or sequence of courses
We deliver our courses to all ages starting from 8 years old and our courses are independent and any student can apply to any course
Our students are always changing they are not fixed as each student normally attend only one course so I don’t have the concept of academic year, batches or semesters
 
My cycle is I define the course template where I add the course name “Oil Painting Level 1” and its number of sessions (12) and its price (EGP 1,000) and its PDF file
 
Then I create a group for this course and I call it “Oil Painting Level 1 Mon & Wed (3 – 6 PM)” then I add the instructor and I assign the schedule and select the room
 
Then I add the interested students to this group then I have all the fees to collect (EGP 1,000 x Nb. Of students)
 
Each course runs for a specific number of times, some courses are 10 times (30 hours), some are 20 times (60 hours) etc..,
 
They don’t run for a period from a date to another date, so I need to specify the start date and the days and the system schedules the sessions accordingly
 
I need to have physical classrooms with availability so the system can schedule based on free slots or gives me warning in case of conflict

In the ever-changing world of technology, speed and reliability are two of the most important aspects any user looks for in their internet connection. Mobile proxies provide surfers with a secure and fast connection, allowing them to remain anonymous and view content from all over the world with no IP restrictions. However, most mobile providers have data limits that restrict how much you can surf the web in a given month, and limit the type of bandwidth available to you.

That’s where TurboWare's 4G LTE mobile proxies ( bit.ly/3Qm0Qpt) come in. They provide users with an UNLIMITED data connection, giving you the freedom to surf the web without any limitations. This makes them one of the most advanced services on the market, and thanks to its high speeds, you can experience a fast and secure connection without any worries.

What is a Mobile Proxy?

A mobile proxy is a service that routes traffic through a mobile device such as a smartphone or a tablet. This helps to hide your IP address, location, and other identifying information, making it easy to browse online content anonymously. The service assigns you a static IP address that acts as a gateway between you and the internet. All requests to and from the internet will go through that static IP address, which prevents websites from tracking your exact location.

In addition, the service allows you to access geo-blocked websites and content that you couldn’t access before due to geographic restrictions. With TurboWare's 4G LTE mobile proxies, you can now access all your favorite websites from any location in the world.

How Does 4G LTE Work?

4G LTE stands for “Fourth Generation Long-Term Evolution” and is the current standard for mobile wireless communication. It is a type of cellular network that can deliver data speeds of up to 40 Mb/s, which is significantly faster than 3G connections.

In order to use 4G LTE, your device has to be able to access a 4G LTE network. This means that if your device is not supported by the 4G LTE networks in your area, you won’t be able to connect to the internet using 4G LTE.

TurboWare's 4G LTE Mobile Proxies

TurboWare offers high quality 4G LTE mobile proxies that give you access to UNLIMITED data. This means that you can browse the web at speeds of up to 40 Mbps without worrying about hitting a data limit.

TurboWare also offers a wide range of other features that make their 4G LTE mobile proxies the perfect choice for anyone who wants to stay anonymous online. The service comes with multiple IP addresses from different countries, allowing you to bypass geo-blocks, access foreign websites, and protect yourself from being tracked.

Additionally, their 4G LTE mobile proxies have built-in security features such as NAT firewall protection, DDoS mitigations, and anti-VPN detection. This provides an extra layer of protection, so that you can safely browse the web without worrying about your data being compromised.

Conclusion

TurboWare's 4G LTE mobile proxies ( bit.ly/3Qm0Qpt)  give users the freedom to access the internet without having to worry about data caps or slow speeds. They offer UNLIMITED data and top-of-the-line security, making them the perfect choice for anyone who wants to stay anonymous online. So if you’re in the market for a reliable and secure internet connection, look no further than TurboWare's 4G LTE mobile proxies.

in Russia we have two major operators of e-mail and search - Mail.ru (www.mail.ru) and Yandex (www.yandex.ru).

Both operators have on their websites a digest from third websites with news and articles concerning interest of the user. Situation is that I noticed that they can post articles that can interest me althouth I did not search it at all! What is that? Is the technology of artificial intelligence went so far that they can read my thoughts?

One more: I wrote a message in Mail.ru to my friend about going to basketball game. He answered that he can not go this month. The Mail.ru offered me several variants to respond his message (like "very pity", "when you can", "very bad"). What is that? Is the artificial intelligence of Mail.ru can read and understand (!) the written text? I can not believe that technology has gone so far.

There is also a question about neutrality of this technology. As far as I understand the technology of artificial intelligence is neutral to people and even it can understand and analyze text and, even, possibly, thoughts (fantastic!), anyway such technoly works according program code and have neutral attitude to people. Is it correct?

But I understand that people can also include preferences and even negative attitude in artificial intelligence.

There is also one more example how artificial intelligence worked that I saw in Russia in robot exhibition:

- I asked robot a question and he understood my question and searched the answer in Yandex search engine and gave me correct answer. I was surprised, because it was not just search on one key word but robot got key word from the whole question, searched it and gave me correct answer. How it works?

Anyway, what concerning my mail correspondence with my friend, I did not like that mail operator offered me variants of answers to letter of my friend. It means that mail operator on Mail.ru (I did not see it on Yandex where I have also e-mail) reads and understands my letters.

So there is situation, and I will be very pleased if you can briefly explain me situation.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Mikhail Lukin

Saratov, Russia

Hello Shraddha,

Unfortunately situation with TreBox is sad.

The TreBox website is perfectly done and almost all small mistakes are corrected but we have two problems:

1) we do not have enough ads on TreBox. The idea was that many private individuals will post their ads on TreBox and because of many private ads we will receive big capitalisation. It did not happen. From one side it is good that  we became a platform for business ads - it means that we look serious and solid and companies and businessmen see in us the platform to promote their businesses. From other side we understand that capitalisation can be received mostly from many private ads and, as I see, we do not have any.

2) we did not receive a penny from our ads. We received absolutely no money. Several ads list more than one period (after which payment should be done), but we received absolutely no money. It is sad.

We should think how to promote TreBox between private individuals, so people can offer their private goods on TreBox. The capitalisation and receiving the similar success as "Avito" (www.avito.ru) website has  in Russia can be achieved only in attracting many private individuals to post their ads on TreBox.

As a conclusion, I can say that we have to think for TreBox to become not only platform for business ads but a platform for mainly private individuals to post their ads. It means capitalisation.

The platform for businesses is good and look solid, but we can not work in minus in monetary matter. We need capitalisation for TreBox to work and develop. If we get capitalisation then in future we can maintain platform for businesses and to think about it.

So, here my thoughts on the current state and future of TreBox.

And one more thing: it will be sad if because of lack of capitalisation we will be need to close TreBox after one year of existence (as I understand in May of the next year). So we have time and in this time I will try to attract investments or even find a sponsor to maintain TreBox and let it live and develop.

I like TreBox. This project looks solid and is perfectly done and my dream is for that to exist during my lifetime. But we can not work in minus and just spend money without getting profit in return. If we would be rich we would let this project live, as I say, just because. But we can not afford ourselves to work in minus.

Ok. These were my thoughts on TreBox.

Till May we should do the following efforts:

1) to try to attract many private individuals on TreBox to post their ads,

2) to try to find investor or venture capitalist for TreBox,

3) to try to find sponsor for TreBox who will provide us money with nothing in return just to make this project live for lifetime.

We have these goals and we will think how to achieve them.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Mikhail Lukin

Saratov, Russia

Dear Sir,

We need an online shopping Portal to sell African clothing and its accessories. This online shop would have the capacity to allow customers to buy along 3 possibilities. 1. OTS (Off the Shelf), 2. MTO (Make to Order) and 3.  A combination or variation of 1 and 2 with the possibility of adding accessories to the shopping cart that matches the buy. Accessories such as footwear, jewelry, caps etc.

1. OTS: This is a buy option whereby customers chose the design type, fabric, colour and predefined size (i.e XS, S, M,  L XL XXL) and this is already in stock and the necessary accessories is chosen and its paid for
2. MTO: This is a buy option whereby the customer is given the option to chose and vary the design type, fabric, colour but the size of the garment is then made to a specific size which the customer is allowed to input his size based on measurement criteria to be given on the website.
3. The third option is to have a variation of the two options above in a particular process and also adding accessories to the purchase. 

The payment possibilities are the normal Mastercard, Visa, Paypal and Bank transfer

The online shopping portal is to be easy to access and navigate with simple logic and not too busy. Registration is compulsory with verification to capture basic details of customers and their preferences for marketing purposes and customer retention. 

There are examples of webshops we have seen which can give an idea of what we want, although we still think both website are too busy and not easy to navigate but they have most of the basic features we are looking for.

1. itailor.com and 2. indianwedingsaree.com 

To have an idea of the kind of clothing products we have please visit our facebook page: @keanvicclothingng and on Instagram: @mr_keanvic

Hello,

I am looking to build a site with below functionality. I can do most of the wordpress development and design myself. I need help with a creating a compatibility test.  A couple would take the same quiz separately and then after both have taken the "compatibility quiz" the answers need to be compared in a report. The couple could take this test one at a time or at the same time on separate devices. 

The quiz will only have 3 answers per question. They will all be the same. They are as follows Agree, Unsure and Disagree. Once both couples have taken the test, I would like the answers to be compared side by side in a report, noting and marking any questions where the couples answers did not match or where they did not input the "correct" answer (that we will supply). Each question section (roughly 10 questions per section) would display a percentage average of "compatibility" based on the couples answers matching or not. 

At the bottom of the report, I would also like a total percentage average "compatibility". If possible, I would like these averages to display in small attractive pie charts, if possible and if cost is not too high. 

AFTER the couple reviews the "compatibility" report, I would like them to be able to send the report to themselves and to specific emails addresses they specify.  I would also like an export to pdf download link and the option to print the results. 

The questions will be the same for both people taking the quiz. I would prefer 1 login to the site for each couple. I think having multiple logins is unnecessary for this application. I think it would also simplify billing. 

As far as business flow goes--- couple goes to website and purchases a specific compatibility test. (I will offer different compatibility tests, but the structure will remain the same as I described above.)--------> Once payment has been received, the "test" is unlocked and available for each member of the couple to take it. ---------> the couple takes the test separately (either one at a time or on separate devices)-------> Once both have taken the test, I would like a report generated that the couple can review-------> After review, I would like the couple to have the option to export to pdf, send the results to themselves via email and to send the results to specific email addresses they identify.   

I hope that gives you a better understanding of what I am trying to accomplish. Let me know what you think and if you have any other questions.\

I would like to know the possible costs involved and timeframe for completion. The compatibility tests need to be very user friendly. 

Cheers,

Zach
